entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
